welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lincoln Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant art scene, and delicious food. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and soak up all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Detroit City Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport provides all necessary services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used for official military flights and provides specialized services for military personnel.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal is used for private and charter flights, and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
